app.title: SGEX Workbench
app.subtitle: WHO SMART Guidelines Exchange
app.description: Collaborative editor for WHO SMART Guidelines Digital Adaptation Kits (DAKs)

auth.signInWithPAT: Sign in with Personal Access Token
auth.authRequired: GitHub authentication required. Please authenticate first.
auth.setupToken: Set up your GitHub Personal Access Token

landing.subtitle: WHO SMART Guidelines Exchange collaborative editor
landing.selectAction: What would you like to do?

healthInterventions.name: Health Interventions and Recommendations
healthInterventions.description: Clinical guidelines and health intervention specifications that define evidence-based care recommendations

genericPersonas.name: Generic Personas
genericPersonas.description: Standardized user roles and actor definitions that represent different types of healthcare workers and patients

userScenarios.name: User Scenarios
userScenarios.description: Narrative descriptions of how different personas interact with the system in specific healthcare contexts

businessProcesses.name: Generic Business Processes and Workflows
businessProcesses.description: BPMN workflows and business process definitions that model clinical workflows and care pathways

coreDataElements.name: Core Data Elements
coreDataElements.description: Essential data structures and terminology needed for clinical data capture and exchange (includes Terminology Services via OCL and Product Master Data via PCMT)

decisionSupportLogic.name: Decision-Support Logic
decisionSupportLogic.description: DMN decision tables and clinical decision support rules that encode clinical logic

programIndicators.name: Program Indicators
programIndicators.description: Performance indicators and measurement definitions for monitoring and evaluation

requirements.name: Functional and Non-Functional Requirements
requirements.description: System requirements specifications that define capabilities and constraints

testing.name: Testing
testing.description: Feature files and test scenarios for validating the DAK implementation

testScenarios.name: Test Scenarios
testScenarios.description: Feature files and test scenarios for validating the DAK implementation

terminology.name: Terminology
terminology.description: Code systems, value sets, and concept maps

questionnaireEditor.name: FHIR Questionnaires
questionnaireEditor.description: Structured questionnaires and forms for data collection using FHIR standard

editor.healthInterventions: Publication reference manager with IRIS integration
editor.genericPersonas: Persona definition editor with role-based access specifications
editor.businessProcesses: Graphical BPMN editor with SVG visualization
editor.coreDataElements: Data element editor with OCL and PCMT integration
editor.decisionSupportLogic: DMN decision table editor with validation
editor.programIndicators: Indicator definition editor with measurement logic
editor.testing: Testing viewer with feature file browser

demo.title: Want to try without authentication?
demo.description: Demo mode showcases the enhanced DAK scanning display with mock data.
